title: Input schema for Influencer Discovery Agent
description:
Provide a description of an influencer you'd like to find and the AI agent will look for a match on TikTok for you. You can also provide some usernames to perform an analysis on them.
Please note that you will also be charged for the TikTok Scraper run, per video per entered username accordingly. It can be up to $0.0037 per username.

usernames.title: Usernames
usernames.description: Add one or multiple TikTok usernames you want to evaluate as influencers.

influencerDescription.title: Influencer description
influencerDescription.description: Explain what are you looking for on the influencer, his style of content and engagement capability. Our Agent will evaluate your candidate and give a brief reasoning on if the candidate aligns well with your expectation.
influencerDescription.prefill: The influencer should be a well known persona in the gaming industry. The content should be fast paced, humorous and centered on gaming for young adults.

generatedKeywords.title: Generated keywords
generatedKeywords.description: Number of keywords to be generated by the AI to perform the scrape on TikTok. (max: 5)

profilesPerKeyword.title: Profile per keyword
profilesPerKeyword.description: Number of profiles to be scraped per generated keyword. (max: 10)
